predicate.note: Frames file for 'classify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 29.2, other framed members include count, define, describe, employ, establish, intend, portray, rank, recommend, redefine, regard, treat. Comparison with define.

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Her recent report classifies the stock as a ``hold.''
